text: Disagree with this. The march to herd immunity shouldn’t be thought of like a light switch. Yes, it’s important to #MaskUp, limit size & number of gatherings esp indoors, etc, but having 54% of 🇺🇸 adults now w/ at least 1 dose of #COVID19 #vaccine is def contributing to ⬇️ cases. https://t.co/RLpeLtNH9w
